rows.label: qst300405_msg001
rows.name: Post-battle with mercenary Driver

rows.label: qst300405_msg0001
rows.name:
Guh...[ML:Dash ] It seems you do not understand
that you are in the wrong.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0002
rows.name:
The restoration of Envia is
what will bring prosperity
to the people of Gula!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0003
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Envia, you say?

rows.label: qst300405_msg0004
rows.name:
Yes, that's right! The great noble
house of Envia, which was erased!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0005
rows.name:
The one who inherits the blood of
its head, Hannes, is the rightful
heir to the Kingdom of Invidia!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0006
rows.name:
Envia...[ML:Dash ] Hannes...[ML:Dash ] The
War of Succession.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0029
rows.name: The War of Succession? Is that...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300405_msg0007
rows.name:
It was a power struggle between
nobles that occurred during the
founding of the Kingdom of Invidia.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0008
rows.name:
Currently, the Six Great
Nobles hold power,

rows.label: qst300405_msg0009
rows.name:
but in the past, nine noble
houses vied for supremacy.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0010
rows.name:
The House of Envia was a great noble
house that was equal to the current
royal house, Selosia, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300405_msg0011
rows.name:
the head of the House of Envia,
Hannes, was not blessed with an heir.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0012
rows.name:
It was said he had a secret child in Gula,
which caused some temporary confusion,
but in the end, it was just a rumor.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0013
rows.name:
And so, the House of Selosia
took the throne, and the
Kingdom of Invidia was born.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0014
rows.name:
You know your history
well...[ML:Dash ] Hehe...[ML:Dash ] The child
of Hannes was no rumor.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0015
rows.name:
He truly existed, and his bloodline
has continued to this day!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0016
rows.name:
I see...[ML:Dash ] So you intend to give the
Jeweled Signet to that person and
start the War of Succession anew.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0030
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]!! I won't let you do that!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0017
rows.name:
In any case, we'll be taking
back the Jeweled Signet.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0018
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]It's not here. And I have no
intention of telling you.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0031
rows.name: What did you say?!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0019
rows.name:
If Superbia gets wind of this spark,
Invidia will fall into chaos.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0020
rows.name:
If that happens, the Gulan territory
where the army is stationed, and this
city, will not remain peaceful.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0021
rows.name:
That's not true! He promised that
Gula wouldn't be affected...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300405_msg0022
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Speak.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0023
rows.name:
S-Superbian army...[ML:Dash ] the one on
the Divine Beast battleship
stationed at the Torigo Base...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300405_msg0024
rows.name: I don't know his name...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300405_msg0025
rows.name:
He said that if I gave him the Jeweled Signet
and the descendant of Hannes became king,
Invidia would eventually belong to Gula...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300405_msg0026
rows.name:
That's impossible. And it's
not even certain if the story
of the descendant is true...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300405_msg0027
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ][ML:Dash ]Tch! Damn it!!

rows.label: qst300405_msg0028
rows.name:
We'll get it back before
it's taken to the Empire.

rows.label: qst300405_msg0032
rows.name: Yeah, let's go!
